title: Provide food and medical aid to starving civilians in Madaya, Syria.
body:
We must help the starving children and families in Madaya, Syria who have been besieged for months. The Syrian government has prevented the entry of food and aid.  And the civilians are prevented from leaving, trapped in a mountainous region, surrounded by land mines and snipers. Doctors without Borders reports that at least 23 have died in December alone, and many more will likely be at risk of death and severe illness as winter sets in.

We the People implore our administration to immediately provide food & access to medical care to the 30,000 civilians who are being starved to death. We also need to ensure that there are safe passages for ongoing humanitarian aid.

title: Provide Secret Service protection to Bernie Sanders
body:
On Friday, January 8, police in Las Vegas responded to a bullet hole which had been fired through the window of Presidential hopeful and lifelong Independent, Senator Bernie Sanders' campaign office.

Despite their apparent initial confusion of the bullet hole's source and basic ballistics, it is obvious to thinking American Citizens that guns are where bullet holes come from.

Secret Service protection is normally provided to candidates at 120 days prior to the general election.  However, Ben Carson and Donald Trump have been protected since October of 2015.

This is the first and only such event of the campaign, and Mr. Sanders is obviously the one who needs the most protection, as he is the most credible threat to establishment politics and gun nuts.

Please protect Mr. Sanders!!

title: Arrest Ammon Bundy and the armed occupiers of the Malheur Wildlife Refuge.
body:
President Obama,
We respectfully request that you end the armed occupation of the Malheur Wildlife Refuge immediately. At the very least, you owe the American people an explanation as to why the area has not been isolated. Members of their organization can come and go as they please, members of the community can visit the occupied facility, and other right-wing extremist groups such as the Idaho III% can show their support.
Law enforcement inaction up to this point is an egregious violation of public safety and emboldens their erroneous assertions that the US Government has no Constitutional Authority.
Please end the siege of the refuge and arraign Ammon Bundy as soon as possible.

title: Create a National Animal Abuse Registry
body:
Starting in January 2016, the FBI will be gathering data on Animal Abuse now that it is a felony with its own status. Although there may be some local, regional, and state movements to track animal abusers, the many smaller databases are often inadequate. It would aid pet-related businesses and animal adoption groups.

We simply ask that if an offender is found to be guilty of animal abuse against pets and farm animals, they be placed on a National Database that is easily accessible by those who might need it and covers all states with recorded data in a single searchable database.

Some of the abuses covered in such a list should include the malicious and intentional maiming, mutilation, torture, wounding, or killing of a living animal as well as those guilty of neglecting their animals.

title: PROVIDE BERNIE SANDERS WITH SECRET SERVICE PROTECTION.

title: Grant individuals with Down's syndrome monthly disability benefits, regardless of parents income (up to 100k yearly).
body: We believe individuals with Down's syndrome are entitled to their benefits regardless of their parents income. title: Issue an investigation into the practices of the National Football League for violating relocation guidelines.

St. Louis and the State of Missouri have offered more than $400 million in public money to help build a new stadium for the Rams.

title: make January 11th a national holiday in honor of Alexander Hamilton's birthday.
body: In honor of one of our greatest founding fathers, January 11th should be recognized as a national holiday to celebrate the life and success of Alexander Hamilton. Until recently, Hamilton's accomplishments were not widely known by the general public. This day (Hamilton's birthday) should be recognized by all Americans to respect and honor the financial system (and in turn the current monetary system) that we live and abide by today.

title: create a "Blue 22" Alert for Americans Veterans who are missing and may be a danger to themselves.
body:
Currently the United States has systems in place to help the public search for missing children (Amber Alert) and for missing elderly (Silver Alert).  The media and Veteran's Organizations have recently focused on the 22 Veterans who commit suicide each day.

The powers of social media and modern technology are not being used to the fullest extent.  When a Veteran is missing and believe to be in danger, the same Alert Systems that are activated for missing children and seniors SHOULD be activate to alert for missing and endangered Veterans.

title: Nationally recognize February 7-14 as Congenital Heart Defect Awareness Week.
body:
Congenital heart defects are the #1 birth defect worldwide. Nearly 1 of every 100 babies is born with a CHD.

CHDs are the #1 cause of birth defect related deaths.

CHDs are the leading cause of all infant deaths in the US.

Each year approximately 40,000 babies are born in the US with a CHD.

Each year over 1,000,000 babies are born worldwide with a CHD. 100,000 will not live to see their first birthday; 1,000s more die before they reach adulthood.

There are an estimated 2,000,000 CHD survivors in the US.

There are more than 40 types of CHDs,there is no known prevention or cure for any of them.

In the US, twice as many children die from CHDs annually than from all forms of childhood cancer, yet funding for pediatric cancer remains five times higher than for CHDs.

title: put President Obama in the 2017 NBA All-Star Celebrity Game.

The 2017 NBA All-Star Celebrity Game will be held on February 17, 2017 in Charlotte, North Carolina. As of the publishing of this petition, former Education Secretary Arne Duncan holds the record for most points scored in a Celebrity Game with 20.

With all due respect, this is a soft record. President Obama will have a month out of office to train for the game, and there's no question he can destroy Mr. Duncan's record and the will of the opposing team.

This is your chance to finally make history, Mr. Obama. Seize it.

title: Accept the challenge from the NRA's Executive Vice President, Wayne LaPierre, to a fair and public debate.

title: Remove Marijuana from Schedule I of the Controlled Substances Act to Allow for its Medical Use.
body:
The U.S. Government holds a patent on its use because of its medicinal properties. Please see Patent # US 6630507 - Cannabinoids as antioxidants and neuroprotectants. You can read the entire patent at:
http://www.google.com/patents/US6630507

Removing marijuana from the Controlled Substances act or at the very least re-scheduling it, would allow millions of Americans who are currently prevented from using medical marijuana without fear of prosecution to benefit from its therapeutic value. By removing marijuana from Schedule I and legalizing its use as a medicine in the U.S. the huge increase in tax revenues that would be generated through taxation on the sales of marijuana could be spent on medical research and healthcare.

title: Remove Noise Reducing "Silencers" or "Suppressors" from the National Firearms Act as a Class 3 Regulated Item.
body: Silencers are regulated under the National Firearms Act as a Class 3 item, that carrys a long list of requirements to be met before being able to take legal possession of the item. Before being added to the NFA suppressors, or silencers, were common practice with American gun owners due to the obvious benefits that come with potentially hearing-damaging noise reduction. These items are almost unheard of in criminal activity and have an unfair image based on Hollywood propagandaand misinformation. As such suppressors do not belong in this category of regulated weapons.

title: Investigate the Delaware North Corporation's claim to own trademark on historically important Yosemite landmarks.
body:
The Delaware North Corporation, a concessionaire in Yosemite National Park for decades, has been replaced with another vendor after a competitive bidding process. Delaware North now insists that they own Trademark for historically significant and precedent park properties as a condition of their original contract with the Nationl Park Service - although they made no attempt to register the Trademarks until 2002.

Delaware North is now demanding that the taxpayer pay over $50 million for the rights to these national treasures.

We petition the USPTO to investigate and invalidate Delaware North's claims and prevent the extortion of the public and renaming of park landmarks that have been run by a succession of third party vendors for over 100 years in some cases.

title: EXECUTIVE ORDER Rare Disease Day as February 29, 2016. A Rare Disease is one that affects fewer than 200,000 Americans.
body: A Rare Disease is one that affects fewer than 200,000 Americans.  There are nearly 7,000 such diseases affecting nearly 30 million Americans,  according to the National Institute of Health  (NIH). Two-Thirds of those affected are children, and the diseases tend to be serious and lifelong.  Evenso, most rare diseases have no approved treatment, and many are not being studied by medical researchers. Often, research on Rare Diseases is funded by families and friends of patients or by patient organizations.  On February 29, 2016, millions around the world will be celebrating for public awareness.  WE are requesting for an Executive Order that every last day of February be observed as Rare Disease Day in the United States of America Mr. President. Thank you in-advance for your consideration.

title: Reaffirm commitments to Taiwan (R.O.C.) and work toward recognizing it as an independent and sovereign country
body:
In 1928, the USA was the first government to recognize the Republic of China. Now in Taiwan, the government has become a beacon of democracy and freedom in Asia.

The people have elected the first woman president, Tsai Ing-wen, and have given a majority to the opposition, the Democratic Progressive Party. This shows Taiwan is a free democracy, allows peaceful transition of powers, promotes human rights and gender equality.

Because of the People's Republic of China, few countries have formal relations with Taiwan. China threatens with military exercises, bullies Taiwanese people when they display national pride, and bullies the world into believing there can be only "one China."

The USA should reaffirm its commitment to Taiwan, and should stand on the side of democracy, not coercion.

title: Change the U.S. National Anthem to Star Wars theme "The Imperial March"
body: This petition calls for the Federal Government to change the National Anthem of the United States of America to Star Wars theme "The Imperial March".

title: Clean Up the Drinking Water of the Impoverished Community of St. Joseph, Louisiana
body:
The town of St. Joseph in Tensas Parish, LA is the poorest community in the state.  Nearly 40% of the population is below the poverty line, and the unemployment rate is likewise staggering.

Since at least 2012, the community has been under a more-or-less constant boil water advisory.  Residents, though, say that the problems with the water system were present long before this date.  This, of course, affects mostly the poor, black population within the town proper.

City and state leaders have failed to timely and adequately address this issue.  Meanwhile, the poorest among us are without drinking water.  This petition calls on President Obama to declare a federal emergency in St. Joseph and to divert federal resources for the repair of the town's water infrastructure.

title: Help get the SMU Mustangs into the NCAA Tournament
body:
The NCAA has wrongly and unfairly barred the SMU Mustangs from the NCAA basketball tournament because of the indiscretions of one player and a former administrator.

That administrator and player and no longer with the program, and now it's time to do what's right. It's time to stop punishing the innocent.

It's time to free SMU.

And it's time to allow the Mustangs into the 2016 NCAA Tournament

title: Order the lowering of the American Flag in respect for the 12 US Marines lost in the Hawaii helicopter crash.
body:
The lowering of the United States National Flag is a sign of respect for the passing of government officials and dignitaries, such as Memorial Day, the flag shall be lowered to half mast until noon.

  The death of the 12 United States Marines in the horrific helicopter crash off the coast of Hawaii should be an example of how dangerous the jobs of our service members are on a daily basis, whether training in the United States or fighting the war overseas.  It is imperative that we pay our respects as those Marines, who selflessly gave their lives for our freedom.

  In accordance with the United States National Code, Title 36, Section 175, subsection (m), this situation meets the criteria to have the flag flown at half mast.

  We, The People, demand a response in this regard.

title: instruct the USFWS to continue ultralight led reintroduction of whooping cranes into the Eastern Migratory Population
body:
Ultralight (UL) guided migration of whooping cranes has been a key part of the most successful attempt to date of reintroducing an additional wild population of endangered whooping cranes.

The USFWS has decided to discontinue the UL portion of the reintroduction, spearheaded by the privately funded organization, Operation Migration, because chick survival has not been up to expectations, in spite of a record 24 chicks hatched in 2015.

While the new population has not yet become self sustaining due to  high chick mortality, no other tested reintroduction method has been as successful as the UL method. We ask that the USFWS be directed to continue ultralight guided reintroduction of at least 10 chicks annually until an alternative more successful method is developed and proven.

title: Stand for the Suspension of Bee-Killing Pesticides
body:
The EPA is currently considering the suspension of neonicotinoids, one of the most widely used insecticides in the country, after finding that they are highly toxic to honey bees.

We ask that President Obama support the EPA by publicly standing for the suspension of these dangerous chemicals, as the EU has already done.

Bees are responsible for almost one out of every three bites of our food. President Obama, you have shown your support for bees before. The catastrophic demise of bee colonies is a frightening sign that these chemicals are not safe even in low doses. Please publicly urge your environment agency to protect us with wise and immediate action.

As Rachel Carson once said: "In nature nothing exists alone." What happens to the bees, happens to us.

title: Full investigation of the death of LaVoy Finicum by Federal Agents on January 27 2016, by the United States AG
body:
This petition requests that  a full investigation by federal prosecutors and the Attorney General in the events that resulted in the death of LaVoy Finicum whom was shot dead by federal agents in route to a meeting with the Harney County Sheriff's Department to discuss the subject of turning himself and others in to custody on Tuesday January 20, 2016.

Eyewitness accounts have LaVoy Finicum with his hands up and unarmed at the time he was shot by federal officers representing the Federal Bureau of Investigations.


It is petitioned a full transparent investigation  by the Attorney General's office take place to determine if any official in the line of duty acted against federal law in the death of LaVoy Finicum and if found so be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law.

title: Free the Hammonds
body: Father and son, Dwight L. Hammond, 74, and Steven D. Hammond, 46, are currently serving a 5 year sentence under the Anti-terrorism and Effective Death Penalty Act of 1996 for having started two range fires on their property that spread onto less than 140 acres of their own BLM range. They have paid over $400,000 in civil fees and have already spent time in federal prison for the fires, but were recently resentenced after an appeal by the Federal prosecutor. Please free the Hammonds and right this injustice.

title: light up the White House blue in April for all those impacted by Autism.
body:
Over the last 15 years the rate of autism prevalence has climbed from 1 in 150 to 1 in 68, a 119% increase.  Boys are 5 times more likely to be identified as having autism than girls, 1 in 42 boys will be diagnosed.  Research has shown that early intervention has a significant positive impact on those with autism.

In 2015, President Obama issued a proclamation recognizing world autism day as April 2, 2015 and encouraged all Americans to learn more about autism and how they can support it.

This petition asks that President Obama once again recognize world autism day on April 2, 2016 by lighting up the White House blue, sending a powerful visual signal of support to those Americans impacted by autism.

title: Block self serving small business management from accepting buyouts from larger companies without shareholder approval.
body: Astellas Pharma, a Japanese company, is currently attempting to acquire Ocata Therapeutics, a US company, via tender offer. Ocata CSO, Dr. Robert Lanza, patented a way to culture embryonic stem cells without harming the embryo. Ocata held a trial in which the world's leading cause of blindness was reversed/halted rather quickly using these cells. Even after 4 years, there is major improvement to their vision & no adverse effects. These cells have also shown promise in potentially curing a plethora of other afflictions, e.g., MS, Crohn's disease, and Sepsis. Paul Wotton took over as CEO in 2014. As was recently discovered, he almost immediately began discussions with Astellas without shareholder knowledge and assured he leaves with a hefty payday. The US can't lose this technology to Japan.

title: Prosecute the Oregon Militants and any accomplices to the fullest extent of the law.
body:
Many of the people who occupied the Malheur National Wildlife Refuge in Oregon have been allowed to walk away without any consequences.

We feel that this is a gross miscarriage of justice. We feel that laws which protect the public from violent extremism should be enforced equally regardless of race, religion, or political affiliation.

We are asking that President Obama ensure that any person who illegally occupied the Malheur National Wildlife Refuge be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law. We also ask that anyone who provided material support to the militants also be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law.

As such, we also feel that President Obama should recommend that the Oregon Militants be prosecuted as domestic terrorists.

title: Require the use of nonlead ammunition for the taking of wildlife nationwide.
body: Require the use of nonlead ammunition for the taking of wildlife nationwide, including game mammals, game birds, nongame birds, and nongame mammals, with any firearm, to reduce the risk of lead exposure to wildlife and humans. Scientific studies have documented deaths and other adverse health effects of lead exposure in humans and wildlife species, including avian predators and scavengers such as bald eagles, golden eagles, turkey vultures, red-tailed hawks, as well as numerous upland game bird species, such as mourning doves, ring-necked pheasants, and wild turkeys. The USFWS adopted a nationwide ban on the use of lead ammunition for hunting waterfowl in 1991 after studies showed waterfowl can ingest expended lead shot and die or suffer other debilitating effects from lead exposure.

title: Initiate a Federal Investigation into the death of John Lang, a suspected murder by Fresno Police Department.
body:
This petition calls for a federal investigation into the Fresno Police Department of Fresno, California, regarding the death of John Lang, a known activist within the Fresno community.

We the people believe that a Federal investigation into the conduct of the Fresno Police Department, leading up to the death of John Lang, warrants federal review.

We the people assert that an investigation into these agencies is necessary in order to demonstrate the Obama Administration's commitment to restoring transparency within the justice system.

title: Reinstate the tax exempt status of service members deployed to Incirlik AB, Turkey
body: Currently, American service members are deployed to Incirlik Air Base. The hardships that an extended deployment to anywhere imposes on the service member and his family are immeasurable. Incirlik AB does not currently qualify for the combat zone tax exclusion. It previously had until 2005 when we withdrew our troops from Turkey.  Our troops have returned and are now engaged in direct combat support of the war on terrorism and more specifically ISIS. We believe that the tax exempt status of these troops defending the safety of free citizens around the world should be re-evaluated.  As this can only be accomplished via Executive Order we ask that you sign this petition asking President Obama to reinstate Incirlik Air Base, Turkey as a tax exempt combat zone.

title: create a White House Office for Children and Youth
body:
According to the U.S census Millennials outnumber baby boomers by 5 million and range between the ages of 14 and 34. However, the youngest member of Congress is 31, this age gap is significant and demonstrates that in todays world the younger generation does not get a voice in issues that impact their lives. This petition aims to create a White House Office for Children and Youth which will focus on legislation regarding youth 24 and younger, the office will also create a Youth Advisory Board where citizens ages 14-24 can serve on the board and advise members on legislation.
This office, and the Youth Advisory Board, will finally give youth a chance to have a say in what happens to them. Please sign this petition so that millennials, and the generations that follow, can have a voice..

title: Re-institute lower USPS postal rates for Deployed Military Care Packages.

Care Packages are an excellent resource for those troops,  and families/supporters desire to help. USPS instituted a recent price hike (almost 25%) for online large flat rate postage, removing the previous discounted amount. The limited cash flow to purchase items to send to overseas troops, should be directed toward supply purchase, not to postage fees. Many donations come from shallow pockets, from people with big hearts, attempting to improve morale and improve their situation. Please help to re-institute a significant postal discount for packages going to our deployed soldiers so we can continue project.

title: Make it illegal to deny gender marker changes to transgender individuals who have not had surgery.
body:
In many states, it is a requirement for those who identify as transgender prove that they have had medical treatment or surgery to reflect their true gender. While, this is a crucial step in transitioning, most do not have the money to just go out and get surgery and in the mean time changing their gender on identification documents is vital part of their life.

This petition is to make it illegal to deny someone's gender marker change based on the fact they haven't had surgery. Certain states DO allow for a transgender individual to change their gender marker but it is my belief that this is a issue that affects our whole country. This affects numerous people not just me.

title: Provide A Federally Mandated Minimum Wage For Emergency Medical Technicians and Paramedics
body:
We, the undersigned, ask President Obama to sign an Executive Order, just as he has done with Executive Order 13658, mandating that any Emergency Medical Service Agency receiving reimbursement for services through the Federal Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services be mandated to reimburse their Emergency Medical Technicians at a minimum wage of $15.00 per hour and Paramedics at a minimum wage of $20.00 per hour. Failure of those agencies to comply would result in their disqualification from receiving reimbursement from the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services.

The full text with research can be found at http://emsblogs.com/blog/2016/02/federally-mandated-minimum-wage-for-emergency-medical-technicians-and-paramedics/

title: Appoint A Special Prosecutor In The Hillary Clinton Email Scandal/Coverup; Compel Loretta Lynch To Launch Investigation.

body:
President Obama, US Department of State,

title: Reform voting.  The people urge this administration to stop the practice of super-delegates overriding the popular vote
body: Many Americans feel as if the voting system in this country is designed to allow a president to be voted into office that a majority of voters did not elect.  Citizens no longer want to be given the illusion that their votes count, when it is clear that the system is rigged to only appoint establishment candidates.  This petition is demanding that the practice of super-delegates be abolished, and that the president should be elected as a leader for the majority of the people, of the majority of the people, and by the majority of the people.  The citizens of the United States of America, who comprise the majority of this great country's population, want to take back our power, and ask that this unethical practice be dissolved for the 2016 Presidential election.  Thank You in advance.

title: Remove automatic firearms from NFA lists and uphold the Second Amendment
body:
The Second Amendment to the Constitution clearly states:

A well regulated militia, being necessary to the security of a free state, the right of the people to keep and bear arms, shall not be infringed.

The "Reserve Militia", legally defined as all able-bodied men ages 18-45, cannot own any fully automatic firearms, unless they are manufactured and registered before 1986. This is a direct infringement of the right to bear arms.

There are under 200,000 legal fully automatic firearms owned by civilians, and only one has been used in a murder. The only other documented murder with a legal automatic weapon was committed by a police officer. Handguns contribute about two thirds of the murders with firearms, and remain undoubtedly constitutional, as recently made clear by the Supreme Court.

body: My husband is being unfairly imprisoned in Colombia!   He worked for 23 yrs as a federal LEO, now retired. (Navy before) Our son was born 5 weeks ago. He is now planning to be a SAHD. title: Tell the Department of Labor to move quickly on implementing the new overtime rule
body:
To: President Obama

Tell the Department of Labor to move quickly on implementing the new overtime rule -- raising the overtime salary threshold from $23,660 to $50,440 -- or opponents in Congress will run out the clock and steal this victory from millions of workers.

title: Require Porn to be an "Opt In" feature with Internet Service Providers rather than a standard feature.
body: In its current state, Internet porn seeks out users by email solicitations and massive amounts of free content throughout Internet browser searches. The average person, even children, can type in the word "face," "dog" or "horse" and instantly be inundated with offensive and disturbing pornographic images. Parents and individuals have to go to great lengths to install Internet filters that often don't weed out all porn. We are asking for greater protection and responsibility from Internet Service providers and our country. We are asking that people who are interested in porn should have to seek it and choose it. They should have to "Opt In" for it by making arrangements to receive it with their Internet Service Provider. Everyone else should be free from it and assumed to "opt out."

title: RETAIN THE PUBLIC INTEREST LOAN FORGIVENESS PROGRAM IN ITS CURRENT FORM BY FORGIVING ALL QUALIFYING STUDENT LOAN DEBT
body: The Presidents proposed 2015 Budget includes a provision that will change the Public Interest Loan Forgiveness (PILF) program by capping overall forgiveness to $57,500. This change only hurts the hard working employees who work by serving their community often in low-wage jobs. These individuals' student loan amounts often exceed the cap as they consist of people with more than a college degree: Social Workers, Speech Pathologists, Primary Care Physicians, etc. These dedicated public servants chose to work for the public good with the added promise that their dedicated service of 10 years would be rewarded with complete loan forgiveness, only to have the rug pulled out from underneath them by a misstep by the administration. Please sign this petition and support those who work to help you

title: Pardon Kwame M. Kilpatrick & Bobby Ferguson of their excessive 28 and 21 year prison sentences for public corruption.
body:
Kwame M. Kilpatrick was elected the youngest Mayor in the City of Detroit in 2001. He was vilified in The Detroit News Media daily for what many believe were racially motivated reasons.

During a Whistleblower trial concerning an affair, Mr. Kilpatrick committed perjury and was forced to resign from office. After vowing to make a comeback, he was investigated by the Feds and found guilty on 24 charges of Bribery & Racketeering and sentenced to 28 years. His friend Bobby Ferguson, a Contractor, was given 21 years.

Although there was no physical evidence linking both men to the alleged crimes, they were convicted with testimony from other Defendants facing prison time themselves. Mr. Kilpatrick was also forced to retain an attorney although there was a conflict of interest.

title: Ensure that race cars be exempt from EPA rules so long as they are operated off-road and not on public roads.
body:
On behalf of all automotive enthusiasts everywhere, we request that the EPA maintain street vehicles modified for race track use exempt from any emissions regulations so long as they are not driven on public roads. In addition to being an enormous industry generating tens of billions of dollars for the US economy, the automotive aftermarket exists to serve the passion and fuel the creativity of us, the auto enthusiasts. Don't kill our dreams.

Non-compliant vehicles driven on non-public roads will not statistically help with any environmental protection as the number of vehicles affected is insignificant, especially when compared to the pollution generated by industrial trucks, factories, and ships. We feel the targeting of automotive enthusiasts by the EPA is unfair and misguided.

title: Legalize cockfighting in the United States
body: Cockfighting in the United States has been banned since 1978. It is time we stand up for our rights as American citizens! All the animal right's groups see is the actual fighting. The groups do not see the passion that the men and women put into their birds! They spend countless hours and thousands of dollars getting the birds in tip top shape. The birds are not just yard pets, but to many they are a way of life. I would much rather my son be in the yard playing with roosters and hens, instead of dealing drugs on the street corner! The government is allowed to send our sons and daughters to war with no promise to come back, but we can't do the same with our birds! PLEASE help legalize cockfighting in the United States!

title: Ensure the Safety of All Citizens by Banning U.S. Senators from Public Restrooms
body: In light of the fact that more United States Senators have been arrested for public restroom misconduct than transgender individuals (There has never been a reported incident of restroom misconduct by a transgender individual) and in light of the push in many states for legislations intended to ban transgender individuals from public restrooms, the transgender community is urging the administration to take executive action to prohibit U.S. Senators from being able to make use of public restroom facilities. The numbers clearly show that our senators are a greater threat to public safety than our community has ever been. Please take this necessary step to protect our women and children from potential danger in public restrooms.

title: Encourage Democrat Super Delegates to follow the will of the people rather than countering the will of the people.
body:
We the people ask the White House to encourage the Democrat Super Delegates to fall in-line behind the will of the people, rather than ignoring the democratic process and countering the popular vote.

By signing this petition, we hope the Democrat super delegates get the message that if they go against the will of the people, they will be depriving themselves of future votes in upcoming elections.
This is also a pledge to withhold our votes from any super delegate that counters the will of the people, either by voting for their opposition, or by not voting for anyone in their respective race.
One way or another the will of the people will be heard.

title: Fight for an End to Cancer.
body:
Each year, millions of of families are affected by cancer. Far too many Americans have felt the devastating pain that comes with this diagnosis. And far too many have watched as loved ones suffer and relentlessly fight to combat this disease.

We support the President's new Moon Shot to end cancer and urge the Administration to do everything in its power to speed research and development to finally cure this awful disease.

***

title: Audit the NRA -- Publicly
body: This is a call for a public audit of the NRA's nonprofit organizations so that citizens can see who they are funding and whether they are behind the unrest caused by "patriot groups" in the West.

title: Stop the Nomination of John B King as Secretary of Education until he can be vetted by the People.
body:
Dear President Obama:

We encourage to listen to and to follow the will of real classroom educators rather than countering the will of the dedicated professional teachers.

Mr King and the reforms he promotes are have been discredited and need to looked at closely and publicly.

Please allow the Senate to vet your nominee for Secretary of Education.

Thanks.

title: Tell the Louisiana Office of Student Financial Assistance to Give Us Back Our TOPS Scholarship Because Education Matters
body: TOPS (Taylor Opportunity Program for Students) is a Louisiana scholarship program which generally covers tuition for in state students who meet mid-level academic benchmarks.  The Louisiana Office of Student Financial Assistance has put an immediate halt to TOPS payments to colleges and universities due to uncertainty related to the state budget.  Approximately 50,000 students are paying for their college tuition with the help of TOPS scholarships.  There are so many bright, intelligent minds that deserve the opportunities for a higher education, which many cannot afford.  By cutting the funds for TOPS, some students may be overcome with financial burden.  Please sign this petition because Education Matters!

title: White House delegate be sent to every Law Enforcement line of duty death funeral.
body:
The White House has failed to acknowledge multiple Law Enforcement line of duty deaths in recent years. However the White House has sent delegates to funerals and acknowledged the deaths of criminals committing criminal acts killed lawfully by Law Enforcement Officers performing their duties v

It is time for the White House to recognize the honest, hard working Officers who have made the ultimate sacrifice for their community and Country.

Sign this position to mandate the White House send a delegate to every Law Enforcement line of duty death and acknowledge the sacrifice made by these brave men and women.

title: Ask EPA and Obama to block construction of Chinese Methanol Refinery in Tacoma, Washington. Bad for Tacoma, bad for USA!
body:
Since our city council and mayor can't seem to come out one way or the other on this issue, I feel it's time to bring this issue to the attention of the big dogs.

It's being proposed to build the world's largest Methanol Refinery on the Tacoma tide flats, for the purpose of refining piped-in natural gas into Tacoma and turn it into methanol, which would then be sent to China to be turned into plastics.

The methanol plant is expected to use 14 million gallons of water each day and use as much power to provide electricity to nearly 400,000 homes,almost the same amount of water the whole city uses on a daily basis.

Almost all the towns around Tacoma are coming out against it, but our mayor and city council remain silent.  This is a very bad idea that will only harm Tacoma. Please help us.

title: Secure resources and funding, and begin development and construction of a gravitational wave based SETI detector
body:
This petition calls for the Federal Government to secure resources and funding, and begin development and construction of a gravitational wave based SETI (Search for extraterrestrial intelligence) detector.

With the construction of the SETI detector, the government can spur job creation in the fields of STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering and Math), and to answer one of the most intriguing questions in astronomy and biology: "Are We Alone?"

title: Have NHTSA require all vehicles sold in the U.S. to have the fuel filler neck on the drivers side by 2020
body:
There are several reasons why this is an important issue.

First, people would be able to get into and out of gas stations safer and more efficiently if everyone was entering from the same direction.

Second, people who have multiple vehicles, or who rent vehicles often would always know which side the tank was on.

Third, and most important is safety.  People are constantly being approached as they fill up.  People-ESPECIALLY THE LADIES-have a much better chance of jumping into the car and locking the door if the filler neck was on the drivers side.

The rest is history: their employer and NASA opted to go ahead in spite of their warning. The engineers turned out to be right: the seals in the booster rocket malfunctioned in the cold, so the Challenger exploded 73 seconds after it left the launch pad. Seven astronauts perished.

It's vital to hold up Mr. Ebeling and people like him as role models, just like we hold up the astronauts as heroes. Good engineers can design things. Great engineers, like Mr. Ebeling, have the courage to speak the truth about the things they make. Let's honor his courage.

As Northeast Florida's first publicly accessible food forest garden, it is serving as a forward thinking example for healthy, low-maintenance sustainable living. The garden is in an area of our country that struggles with food insecurity and food deserts. It is also an incredible story of triumph in the face of unspeakable tragedy. A young life was taken within the walls of the suburban home that used to sit on the same property that now nourishes, educates and heals those within its community. Please let us share our incredible story with you in hopes of inspiring other communities to overcome challenges of all types together.

title: Pass Lynn's Law to make public HP restroom stalls friendlier for those with ostomies, feeding tubes, IV's, and catheters
body:
HP accessible stalls are not friendly to people who have ostomies, feeding tubes, IV lines, urinary catheters, or other similar medical devices.

If people have an ostomy leak and need to change their bags, there is no way to do it discreetly. Stalls should include a sink to allow for cleanup. There should be a shelf at seated level to set out medical supplies for tubes, IV's, and ostomies. A hook should be provided next to the toilet to hang feeding bags. The floor is unsterile and the hooks on doors are too far. Sterility is crucial with these devices. A red sharps container is important for safe disposal of needles and syringes.

HP stalls should be restricted to those whose physicians deem it necessary, similar to HP accessible parking spots. Patients can't wait without consequences.

title: Classify MoveOn.org as a terrorist group due to their violations of the 1st Amendment.
body:
On 3/11/2016 MoveOn.org organized a violent protest at a presidential election rally in Chicago Illinois. Protesters attempted to stir up violence and refused to leave a private event even after police responded. This rally prevented presidential candidate Donald J. Trump from speaking due to a threat of violence. We the people believe that these actions not only resulted in a 1st amendment violation, but were also encouraged by hate.

Because of their 1st amendment violations and ability to organize large violent groups, we ask that you classify MoveOn.org as a terrorist group.

title: Demand National Public Radio, NPR, cover each Democratic equally and fairly.
body: We believe there has been a clear bias regarding NPR or National Public Radio. All we ask is that each candidate is represented equally, fairly, and without bias. That each receives equal air time so the public gets to know each candidates' platform. There has been a clear showing of favoritism among candidatea which should not be the case in a publicly funded entity.

title: remove Secret Service detail from Donald Trump
body: Trump should not have been granted Secret Service protection this early in his campaign.  He is inciting hatred and violence and our tax dollars should not be paying for his protection.

title: Arrest and prosecute Donald J. Trump for incitement to violence. Legal precedent: Brandenburg v. Ohio.
body:
Donald J. Trump has been inciting violent acts amongst his supporters. He should be arrested and prosecuted for this. Legal precedent: Brandenburg v. Ohio. To wit, the Court held that government cannot punish inflammatory speech.
UNLESS that speech is directed to inciting, and is likely to incite, imminent lawless action.

Clearly, he is doing exactly that.

title:
Make it legal for all Motorcyclists within in The United States of America to split lanes.
https://goo.gl/2T2vUl
body:
Lane splitting for motorcycles is a common practice in most of the world, yet in The United States of America, it is not. It's a fact that lane splitting can and shall increase safety for motorcyclists. Please enact a law to make lane splitting legal for all 50 States.

Lane-splitting is safe if done in traffic moving at 50 mph or less, and if motorcyclists do not exceed the speed of other vehicles by more than 15 mph

Compared to riders who were not splitting lanes, lane-splitting motorcyclists were markedly less likely to suffer head injury (9 percent vs. 17 percent), torso injury (19 percent vs. 29 percent) or fatal injury (1.2 percent vs. 3 percent)

Lane-splitting riders were significantly less likely to be rear-ended than non-lane-splitting riders (2.6 percent vs. 4.6 percent)

title: Mr. President, We the people come before you to humbly ask that you immediately terminate USDA'S WS Funding
body:
Mr. President,

We the people come before you to humbly ask that you immediately terminate USDA'S WS Funding due to their lack of following the Law, that we as U.S. Citizens are required to follow! USDA'S WS Employees are told by their supervisors to pay no attention to the law while at the same time Lie in their reporting of the Facts to enable them to continue to receive Taxpayer funding.

Attempts to audit the agency have slipped past. USDA'S WS will only lie about the facts regardless! They are told to Shoot Shovel and Shutup!

We the People do not want to be held responsible for insuring that Ranchers are successful with our tax dollars! Nor do we have any desire to enable the USDA'S WS to kill or poison any more of our wildlife! The Ranchers need to support themselves in this effort

title: Revoke Kansas' statehood under Article 4, Section 4 for failure to guarantee a republican form of government.
body:
Sam Brownback was re-elected Governor of Kansas in a vote being challenged by a professor of statistics in federal court.
He pushed tax cuts in favor of saddling the poor with the nation's highest sales tax on food.
He robbed highway and pension funds, saddling them with bonds that will take a generation to repay. Now, he wants to take funds from the tobacco settlement and local library taxes.
Legislation is being pushed making judges subject to impeachment if they rule against the legislature.
State law leaves no legal remedy via recall.
We urge the President to certify that Kansas can no longer guarantee a republican form of government under Article 4, Section 4; revoke Kansas' statehood; and appoint a Territorial Governor until such time as it proves worthy of re-admission to the Union.

title: Change the majority law in Nebraska
body: The current legal majority age in Nebraska is 19. While the majority age in most states is 18. In the state of Nebraska, an 18 year old can purchase tobacco, vote, enlist in the military, and apply for a credit card. However, one cannot make the adult decision of signing a lease to move out without a parent's consent. This becomes an inconvenience for teens wanting to take on the responsibility of moving out of their parent/guardian's home, in order to begin a new chapter of their lives or break free from a troubled home life. Not to mention, it also becomes an issue for out of state students who move to the state of Nebraska for college. Changing the majority age in Nebraska would allow any 18 year old to have the same privileges as those in most other state, and prevent inconveniences.

title: Deport Donald J. Trump
body: Our nation's Founding Fathers coined the expression that appears on the Great Seal of the United States, "E Pluribus Unum" which means "from many, one." Simply put, our nation's founders aspired to make the United States of America a place where people of different backgrounds, faiths, ethnicity, etc., could come together and be one as Americans.  That is the promise of America that makes our nation exceptional. Donald Trump represents the antithesis of this vision. Trump's goal is not to unite but to divide Americans - to divide us by religion, race and ethnicity.  To pit American against American. Consequently, to preserve the eternal promise of our nation, we call upon the Obama administration to deport Trump to a nation that will grant him residency. (Assuming there is one.)

title: Prosecute Moveon.org for violating Trump supporter's freedom of speech and assembly and inciting violence at rallies.
body: We the people are calling for the prosecution of the agents of Moveon.org for violating the civil liberties of Presidential candidate Donald J. Trump and his followers. The incident on March 11th, 2016 in Chicago, IL violates not only Mr. Trump's freedom of speech, but also his supporter's freedom of assembly, all protected under the 1st amendment of the United States Constitution. Not only were the civil liberties of Trump and his supporter's violated, but also violence was incited by Moveon.org members in which several supporters were physically assaulted within a private venue. As the election process is our main pillar of Democracy, this type of interference shall not be tolerated and must be prosecuted to ensure a free and safe society.

title: Stop letting the Clinton's show up to polling places during voting!
body: Bill Clinton violated voting rules in the Massachusetts primary where the vote was down to 2% between candidates by showing up to do a rally before people could vote. Hillary is in North Carolina as I write this and Bill is in Chicago doing the same thing with no repercussions whatsoever. They're not supposed to be within 150 ft of the polling places, it's time to enforce the rules already in place.

title: Approve the immigration request of "Dave" an Afghan interpreter and hero who served many US Army units with distinction
body: Mr. President, please approve the visa request for fmr. interpreter Dave (KBL2013511012 cases 1-4). He served multiple US commanders with distinction. Soldiers have been filing congressional inquiries for the past year but that merely gives a status. They have no power to push his case through. Former interpreters are being murdered at a rate of 1 every 36 hours in Afghanistan. Dave has received many threats to himself and his young family. Among the many interpreters I encountered, Dave was the best. His work ethic, commitment to the US and love for his family reflect the great ethos we associate with successful American immigrants. Now, he lives everyday in fear that his family will be murdered for his devotion to the US. Don't make them give "the last full measure." Please save Dave.

title: DEMAND THAT THE FLORIDA VOTERS BE ALLOWED TO VOTE AGAIN, DUE TO POLLING LOCATION RUNNING OUT OF BALLOTS & CLOSING EARLY.
body: On March 15, 2016, Florida voters were denied their rights to vote, due to polling locations running out of Democratic ballots and polling locations closing early. We The People demand that the Obama administration investigate these allegations and if these allegations are indeed fact, then we demand that Florida voters should have an alternative voting date for the 2016 Democratic primaries.

title: Authorized the COLD War Medal , to all who served in the US Military during  1947-1991
body: Cold War Service Medal Authorization

title: Initiate a Federal Investigation into the death of John Lang, a suspected murder by Fresno Police Department.
body:
This petition calls for a federal investigation into the Fresno Police Department of Fresno, California, regarding the death of John Lang, a known activist within the Fresno community.

We the people believe that a Federal investigation into the conduct of the Fresno Police Department, leading up to the death of John Lang, warrants federal review.

We the people assert that an investigation into these agencies is necessary in order to demonstrate the Obama Administration's commitment to restoring transparency within the justice system.

title: To Federally mandate CNA to patient ratio in all fifty states.
body:
I am a CNA, and millions of us around the United States want a safe CNA to patient ratio. We rarely get it. Patients are not getting the care they need due to being over loaded. All fifty states need to have a safe CNA to patient ratio.

Like: 9:1 days, 9:1, evenings, 9-12:1 nights.

We also are very under paid as well. Some states only pay minimum wage! I'm sorry but having to risk your license is worth more than minimum wage, and worth more than 10.00 an hr also.

Thanks for reading the petition!

Rachel-CNA

title: Remove the federal budget ban that prevents HHS from working on a voluntary patient safety identifier (MyHealthID)
body: Remove the federal budget ban that prohibits the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) from participating in efforts to find a patient identification solution.  We support a voluntary patient safety identifier.  Accurate patient identification is critical in providing safe care but the sharing of electronic health information is being compromised because of patient identification issues.  Let's start the conversation and find a solution.

title: Use the song HISTORY by One Direction as an anthem for your final year in office.
body: Mr. President, the fans of One Direction miss them dearly during their hiatus. We know how your supporters must dread the end of your term and miss you already. Yet your administration has much more it would like to accomplish. Please listen to HISTORY by 1D and use it as a theme song to bring energy and excitement back to your events while reminding supporters there is more to be done. The lyrics will speak to you and your supporters just as they have for us. These lads from across the pond are also fans of yours (the Irish one even has a statue of you in his backyard), so perhaps they will take break from their break to sing this song for you. We ask you to seriously consider this request because "you and me got a whole lot of HISTORY" and "THIS IS NOT THE END"

title: Play the "Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings" Video Game that was gifted to the President by the people of Poland
body:
To: President Obama

Mr. President, thank you for the almost eight years of service you have rendered to our nation. With that in mind, I have a request that would give you a well deserved, if brief, break.

In May of 2011, you visited Poland and met with the then Prime Minister, Donald Tusk. As is customary, the Prime Minister presented you with several gifts of friendship on behalf of the Polish people. One of these gifts was a copy of the Video Game "The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings".

Obviously, you've had more important tasks to attend to in the intervening years, but as your term in office approaches its end, would it be possible for you to play at least a portion of the game and perhaps share some of your thoughts on it or the Video Game industry in general?

title: Allow the FBI to pursue its criminal investigation of Hillary Clinton's private email server without interference.
body: It has come to the attention of the American people through various news outlets, quoting sources inside the FBI, that their investigation into Hillary Clinton had turned up criminal activity however they're being "stonewalled" by the Obama Whitehouse and not allowed to file formal charges. We, the American people, demand justice and transparency on the matter of a presidential candidate's criminal investigation being suppressed by President Obama.

title: Petition to have the FEC,DOJ, FBI Et al. investigate rigging of election, balloting or caucusing by the Clinton campaign
body: The purpose is to have criminal investigation into the seemingly widespread occurrences of election fraud through the use of voter suppression, i.e. voters being turned away, voters for Clinton given fast track to balloting, Sanders voters being disenfranchised during caucusing, and the huge disparity between the apparent candidate supporters present and the ballot results and disparate exit polls.

title: Explain how & confirm that Army Corps discharges into the St. Lucie & Caloosahatchee Rivers comply w/environmental laws.
body:
The discharges from Lake Okeechobee into the St. Lucie & Caloosahatchee Rivers by the US Army Corps of Engineers are a national environmental disaster; public safety hazard; threat to the health, livelihood, & well-being of many Floridians & Florida communities; deterrent to visitors from across the country; & are devastating to the complex ecosystems of the Indian River Lagoon, Jupiter Inlet, Pine Island, Sanibel Islands & others. Moreover, the discharges are appallingly indifferent towards stewardship of Florida's most precious resource: its environment.

How are these discharges compliant w/environmental laws? What oversight actions have your Administration & EPA Administrator McCarthy taken to ensure that these waters are protected pursuant to law? What actions are presently underway?

title: Do a revote of the Arizona primary due to voter suppression.
body: We the people ask for a revote of the Arizona primary due to voter suppression. Many registered voters who registered Democrat/Republican before the cut off or who have been registered Democrat/Republican for many years are being turned down due to the mislabeling of their registered party for the primary. We ask that this immediately be corrected and fixed and allow the residents of Arizona to participate in a revote for honest Arizona primary voting results.

title: INVESTIGATE THE VOTER FRAUD AND VOTER SUPPRESSION IN ARIZONA 3/22/2016 DEMOCRATIC PARTY.
body: Petition to have the Obama Administration investigate the voter fraud and voter suppression on 3/22/2016 in ARIZONA. Numerous voters who switched from Independent to Democrat could not vote and were turned away or given provisional ballots which in turn were never counted. We the people of the United States of America find this act alarming and would like a complete investigation to uncover the violations that occurred during the Arizona voting on 3/22/2016 and prosecute those responsible to the fullest extent of the law.

title: Reduce the time a voter must wait to vote in a federal election to under one hour.
body:
It is an undue burden to expect voters to wait for multiple hours in order to vote. It permits only those who have many hours to spare to participate in democracy.

In president Obama's 2012 acceptance speech, speaking about the hours many people had to wait, he stated "We have to fix that." And yet, four years later it seems that nothing has been done.

We petition president Obama to mandate that every voter be guaranteed a wait time of less than one hour to cast his/her ballot for every federal election. There should be measures in place so that the wait time can be reduced in case of excessive turnout. Should a voter be forced to wait longer than an hour, that voter should be compensated for his/her time.

title: Have the FBI investigate voter registration changes that have happened in multiple states, NY, PA, CA, AZ, and prosecute
body: Somehow voter registrations information has been changed all across the country. People within States like AZ, NY, and PA have been checking their voter status and noticing that they've been changed from Democrats to Independents. These changes happened WITHOUT consent of the voters and without their knowledge. These changes have caused issues with Democrats trying to vote thus far in AZ and likey to cause the same impact on the remaining states. We petition the president to have the FBI investigate these changes in these states and every remaining state that has not had their primary. We request prosecution of  those responsible for the changes as well. We the voters are tired of our Democracy being hijacked and would like our Constitution given right to vote unimpeded.

title: Investigate the discrepancies in voter party affiliation during the 2016 Presidential Primaries.
body:
After the Arizona primary vote where confusion, unauthorized discrepancies in voter registrations, long lines, unethical news reporting and incompetence resulted in the feeling of voter suppression amongst many, individuals flocked to check their own voter status.

Thousands of voters found that their party affiliation had changed without authorization from Democrat to a variety of other options including Republican, Independent, Libertarian, and non-affiliated.

This incident has been reported in states so far, NY, CA, PA, NJ, MD and OR. This is concerning, particularly in the instances of closed or semi closed primary states that have yet to vote.

We petition the White House to investigate this breach of security for voters to ensure that ALL are able to vote without suppression.

title: implore Medicare to reimburse registered dietitians for medical nutrition therapy for obesity, prediabetes &hypertension
body: This preventive service should be considered on a trial basis, with the potential, by regulation, a permanent benefit. Medicare would collect PQRS data, for 3-6 mos, on their members with obesity, pre-diabetes or hypertension who receive medical nutrition therapy from registered dietitians, (RDs), and compare it to those who have not received such services.  By aggregating the data of several RDs, Medicare would have its own database, anticipated to show cost and health savings to their members. Then, under ACA, reimbursement should become permanent. The Academy of Nutrition Services has an Evidenced Based Library of data showing benefits of these services too.  Give the registered dietitian, "the nutrition expert" the chance to show that "an ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure".

title: Monitor all remaining primaries to prevent irregularities and to ensure full participation of qualified voters,
body: Due to problems in primaries held thus far we ask that the Federal government monitor the remaining primaries more closely to ensure that all qualified voters who wish to vote are able to do so.  It is our belief that there are those who would manipulate access to the ballot to influence the outcome of elections.

title: Restore the Writ of Habeas Corpus to help the innocent get exonerated for crimes they were falsely accused of committing
body: If you were falsely accused and wrongfully convicted, you would want every possible legal safety net to help you. Prior to 1996, the Writ of Habeas Corpus was that safety net. But that safety net was shredded by the 1996 Anti-Terrorism and Effective Death Penalty Act. Now, even if a state court misapplies the Constitution, you still can't have your conviction overturned by a federal court. We Americans deserve to be protected from having our lives and good names ruined by false convictions. Prison is a terrible place, and it's all the worse if you don't belong there. People worry about the government taking away people's rights, but this is the exact opposite: under the aforementioned 1996 law, the government CAN'T give you your Constitutional rights. It is time to correct this injustice.

title: The abolishment of any and all taxes nationwide on sales of Tampons and other related feminine hygiene necessities.
body: We the people petiton the government to abolish the charging of any taxes on tampons and all feminine hygiene products especially those associated with a woman's menstrual cycle and to change the classification of these products to 'necessity' to qualify them for exemption under the current tax code.

title: ACT NOW TO SAVE PUERTO RICO'S DEMOCRACY FROM WALL STREET.
body:
Puerto Rico's debt is more than $72 billion, nearly 100% of its economic output. Double digit unemployment, hundreds of schools closing and a healthcare crisis have triggered the exodus of 1K+ Puerto Ricans per week.

Congress has declined to extend debt-restructuring powers to Puerto Rico, instead yielding to vulture funds and powerful Wall Street interests. According to the draft of the PROMESA Act, an Oversight Control Board will have the power to act on behalf of the Governor and gov. agencies. These decisions are not subject to judicial review.

Puerto Rico rejects a federal control board and attempts against our democracy. The Executive Branch should use the tools at its disposal to help Puerto Rico, as it has done in the past when big banks came calling for help.

Obama, ACT NOW!

title: Put Bernie Sanders on the Washington D.C. Ballot
body: We petition that Bernie Sanders is to be put on the Washington D.C. ballot. By not having him on the ballot is taking away the right of the voters to have their voices heard and be able to choose their favored candidate. It is unfair and voter suppression to keep voters from being able to vote for who they want. This needs to be fixed before D.C. voters cast their votes.

title: Disallow the use of super-delegate voting at the 2016 Democratic National Convention
body:
Super-delegate voting privilege used in the Democratic Party's nominating process for the office of President of the United States of America is unjust and undermines the integrity of the American democracy. The use of super-delegates in the primary voting process creates an oligarchy in which the will and voice of the American people is suppressed. The opinion and influence of a few party leaders should not override the collective majority decision of the American voters.

Therefore, we the people, call on President Obama, the figure-head of the Democratic Party, to publicly address the leaders of the Democratic Party to change party rules to disallow the use of super-delegate voting at the 2016 Democratic Party National Convention and all future conventions.

title: Hold Hillary Clinton fully, legally accountable for her use of a private email server as Secretary of State
body:
President Obama, as our top elected official, we compel you and your administration to hold Hillary Clinton fully, legally accountable for all wrongdoing involved in her use of a private email server as your Secretary of State.  Many lesser government officials, employees and agents have been prosecuted and punished for far simpler and smaller violations of some of the following statutes that Secretary Clinton's activities are known to have been covered by:

18 U.S. Code:

 793
 798
 1924
 2071(b)
 641
 1505
 1519
 1031
 1343
 1346
 371

Any actions or inaction by you or your administration that delays or shields Secretary Clinton from legal consequences in this matter would be an intolerable, unforgivable breach of the trust between you and the American people. Please don't fail us.

title: Put an end to the "Superdelegate" system, which obstructs, undermines and counters our democracy.
body: Despite winning a whopping 81.6 percent of the people's vote, Kim Metcalfe, among other representatives in Alaska are giving their Superdelegate vote to Hillary Clinton. This is not democracy, this is impeding democracy. It is voter suppression. It is treason. We MUST do away with the Superdelegate system, making it illegal and unconstitutional, as it violates and undermines the people's will. WE the PEOPLE. This is America.

title: Honor Anna Marie Duke-Pearce, known to the world as Patty Duke.
body: To have the President of the United States formally recognize the life and accomplishments of the woman knows as Patty Duke. Mental Health advocate, military families advocate, US veteran advocate and an American entertainer with talents beyond description.  Her real name was Anna Marie Duke-Pearce but she used her stage name of Patty Duke to bring attention to issues that really mattered to Americans.  Mental health awareness, using her own mental health issues as a way to inform others that mental health care was and is paramount for those who cannot speak for themselves. She personally provided words of support to those she encountered and she has provided testimony to members and committees of the US Congress. She was "America's Sweetheart". She was a TRUE Miracle Worker.

title: Rescind the Navy Contract with Ingalls Shipbuilding due to State Senate Bill 1523 Legalizing Denial of Necessities
body: President Obama please rescind the $618 million dollar Navy contract with Ingalls Shipbuilding in Pascagoula Mississippi. The state of Mississippi is in the process of passing Senate Bill 1523 which would legalize the denial of goods and services based on religious bigotry. This law will even legalize the denial of basic needs such food, water, clothing and housing. Many groups will be protected by the Civil Rights Act of 1964. However, GLBT's among others are not protected by that law. The intent of Senate Bill 1523 is to harm unprotected groups of Americans. The federal government should not contribute to the economy of states like Mississippi that are harming American citizens.

title: Utilize part of the $1-billion granted toward the opioid epidemic to help the chronic pain pandemic in America.
body: We request that a portion of the $1 billion allocated toward the opioid abuse epidemic be utilized to help the chronic pain pandemic, through funding for improved prevention, treatment, research, provider and patient education and public awareness. Chronic Pain is a major health problem in the United States. According to the American Academy of Pain Medicine, 100 million adult Americans have chronic pain conditions, not including acute or pediatric pain. Pain affects more Americans than diabetes, heart disease and cancer combined. Pain costs society at least $560-$635 annually, equal to $2,000 for everyone living in the U.S. The total incremental cost of health care due to pain ranges between $261-$300 billion and $297-$336 billion due to lost productivity.

title: Cancel the planned USDA dumping of US peanuts on the Haitian market and future surplus dumping there - procure locally
body: The US government subsidizes American agribusiness by purchasing excess production to keep prices high. Some of this production is then sold or donated overseas. In large markets, especially those that do not produce that crop, this may have no effect on the local market and even be beneficial. When it is done in small, poor countries, especially if they also produce that crop, the effect is to lower local prices, increasing poverty. In Haiti this has happened repeatedly over the past two decades, in particular with the world food program and other UN agencies. It's time to stop making poverty worse - the best way to help a country like Haiti is to procure locally, from Haitian farmers. You can see some of them and their peanuts here: https://www.flickr.com/gp/140776392@N06/ja1057

title: pardon Edward Snowden
body: A petition for President Obama to pardon Edward Snowden.

title: Make North Carolina ineligible for federal funding until they repeal HB2 and start protecting everyone's rights!
body:
North Carolina's anti-LGBT law, HB2, makes the Tar Heel State ineligible for federal funds across a wide swath of programs, including highways and transportation, education, and housing, because they discriminate against individuals and strip them of their constitutional rights.
All residents and visitors to NC should not have to be forced into areas where their lives are put in danger because of Trans-misogynistic biases.
Support LGBT, women's and veteran's rights!
Please do not allow the hatred to spread. Send the message loud and clear. Everyone has equal rights! Anti-LGBT laws are unconstitutional!

title: Remove derogatory statements from transgender soldiers' DD-214, Certificate of Release or Discharge from Active Duty.
body:
Figures from the Williams Institute declare that trans people are twice as likely as to serve in our armed services than non-trans peole, that there are currently 15,500 active duty trans soldiers and up to 134,300 trans veterans.

Many employers and state agencies require veterans to submit their DD-214 when applying for work or social benefits. Veterans that have served honorably, should have a DD-214 free of derogatory statements. Section 28 of my DD-214, for example, contains the statement, "Conditions That Interfere With Military Service - Not Disability - Mental Disorders".

Please help our trans veterans regain their lost dignity by directing the Department of Defense to remove derogatory statements from trans veterans' discharge forms.

title: We the people find it very alarming that  Hillary Clinton has not been indicted for her criminal involvement.
body: We the people find it very alarming that Hillary Clinton has not been indicted for her criminal involvement in classified government information being switched to her unprotected home server as well as lying on record about her involvement within the on going investigation. We the people want for Hillary Clinton to be indicted before the ending of the election primaries.

title: Direct the Dept. of Justice & FBI to criminally prosecute anyone who shoots at an unmanned aircraft or "drone."
body:
Shooting at an "aircraft," whether manned or unmanned, is a federal crime under 18 USC 32, punishable by a fine of up to $250,000 or up to 20 years in prison, or both.

Despite nearly a dozen publicized drone shootings since 2014, the DOJ and FBI have neither said nor done anything to enforce the federal criminal law against drone shooters.

State and local laws have been ineffective in stopping drone shootings, and the DOJ's & FBI's failure to enforce federal criminal law against drone shooters has turned common criminals into "folk heroes."

Shooting at a drone creates a dangerous situation that can result in death or injury of persons on the ground, due to a crashing drones and falling bullets. Please direct the DOJ & FBI to enforce federal law and to prevent a tragedy from occurring.

title: Support 2016 National Champions Ribault High School Lady Trojans to visit President Obama.
body: On Saturday, April 2, 2016, Jean Ribault High School, Lady Trojans Girls Basketball team made history by becoming the 2016 National Champions of the Dick's Sporting Goods National Tournament. Coming into the national tournament as the underdogs was no different for these young ladies than attending school on a regular day or growing up in their neighborhoods. These young ladies displayed poise, class and faith to persevere to a great achievement. For this reason, we'd like the 2016 National Champion Running and Gunning Lady Trojans of Jean Ribault High School in Jacksonville, FL to have the esteemed pleasure of visiting the White House and meeting President Barack Obama and the First Family to show what it looks like when you believe in yourself and make everyone else believe in you, too.

title: #FreeSandow from the oppression of a ruthless dictator. Force WWE to give Damien Sandow TV time.
body: We the People want to see Damien Sandow on RAW, Smackdown, Superstars, and/or NXT. Mr. Sandow is a huge talent and deserves the right to work in this industry. #FreeSandow #PushSandow #GiveSandowAChance #SandowRevolution #WeThePeople

title: Block the Firearm Safety Act of 2015 from becoming federal law.
body: This petition's sole purpose is to ask President Obama, Congress and the Federal courts to block the passing of the Firearm Safety Act of 2015. This Act would force law abiding citizens to register in a federal database to buy ammunition. It would also limit all magazines to a 10rd capacity. This Act is in direct violation of the 2nd amendment and only affects the law abiding citizen ability to protect themselves.

title: To force Mississippi governor Phil Bryant to step down immediately.
body: Mississippi Gov. Phil Bryant has signed a controversial "religious freedom" bill into law. HB 1523, promises that the state government will not punish people who refuse to provide services to people because of a religious opposition to same-sex marriage, extramarital sex or transgender people. However, this law  protects the rights of people who are opposed to homosexuality but who now live in a country where same-sex marriage is a legal right. The bill amounts to a state sanction for open discrimination of which this state has a rampant history and continues to live up to it by the passing of HB 1523. Even without such a law, it is already legal in Mississippi as in most states in the country to discriminate against LGBT people in providing employment, housing, e.c.t.

title: Do Not Allow The Government To Determine If A Person Was Raped
body:
If you have paid any attention to the media recently, you know that several cases of rape have been dismissed for 'lack of evidence'. One of the most well known being Kesha Sebert vs. her Producer/Abuser Dr. Luke.

On Wednesday, April 6th, 2016, a judge denied Ms. Sebert claim and DISGUSTINGLY stated "Every rape is not a gender-motivated hate crime."

A Spain rape victim was asked by judge if she tried 'closing her legs'

Is this how 'honorable' judges handle rape today? With disgusting immature comebacks?

We the people, are asking something to finally be done. It's time to stop victim shaming due to 'lack of evidence'.

Let's change this case, so we can then change the nation, and then, hopefully, the world. Let's not just save Kesha, let's save rape victims everywhere.

title: Add metastasis research as a specific goal of the Cancer Moonshot
body: 90% of all cancer deaths in the United States are caused by metastasis--the spread of cancer through the body. But the current Cancer Moonshot goals don't include research into the causes of and treatment of metastasis. Metastatic research has been chronically underfunded, resulting in a continuing lack of understanding of metastasis and how to stop it. Although many of the moonshot goals may help metastatic patients, understanding the metastatic process is vital to saving lives and turning terminal cancers into chronic diseases. Making metastasis research a specific goal of the Moonshot will bring important attention and resources to bear on solving the mysteries of metastasis and providing better treatments for metastatic patients.

title: Officially declare the month of June as Myasthenia Gravis Awareness Month nationally.
body:
-President Ronald Reagan recognized the need for Myasthenia Gravis Awareness in Proclamation 5261 in 1984 and today non-profit organizations such as Stomp Out MG, the MGFA, & MDA continue this effort.
-Myasthenia Gravis (MG) is a rare neuromuscular auto-immune disease that causes weakness of all voluntary muscles. The symptoms can be treated with medications however there is no cure and MG can be fatal.
-Roughly 70,000 Americans live with MG, many undiagnosed and untreated due to lack of awareness in the public and professional sectors.
-June is known in the MG community as Myasthenia Gravis Awareness Month, and we feel it should be declared on a National level.

title: Declare June 20th  American Eagle Day
body: The Bald Eagle was designated as the U.S.A.'s National Emblem on June 20, 1782 by our Country's Founding Fathers at the Second Continental  Congress. The Bald Eagle is unique to North America and represents such American values and attributes as Freedom, Courage, Strength, Spirit, Justice, Quality and Excellence. The Bald Eagle is the central image used in the Great Seal of the United States and in the logos of many branches of the U.S. Government, including the Presidency, Congress, Defense Department, Treasury Department, Justice Department, State Department, Department of Commerce and the U.S. Postal Service. I encourage all U.S. citizens to join in the support of commemorating our National Symbol with making June 20th American Eagle Day.

title: Include Adjuncts in Loan Forgiveness Program
body: Adjunct educators teach many of the classes that are the foundation of higher learning, and are often the first professors a student has at college. They have the same education and experience as tenure-track professors, and the same student loan debt, but usually make less than half of what their full-time, tenure-track colleagues make. Including adjuncts in the Loan Forgiveness Program would give them the ability to keep making a difference in education while offering a way out of crippling debt in a poor job market.  Adjuncts who teach 4 or more courses at qualifying institutions per academic year for 10 years, and who would qualify if full-time, should receive the same loan forgiveness as their full-time colleagues.

title: POSTHUMOUSLY PRESENT THE PRESIDENTIAL MEDAL OF FREEDOM TO MRS. ELIZABETH "THE HUG LADY" LAIRD OF FORT HOOD, TEXAS.
body:

title: NO to Permits allowing Bald Eagle deaths
body: The proposal to allow thousands of deaths of Bald Eagles each year, by amending the Eagle Take Permitting process, is not based on thoughtful consideration of the biology of the Bald Eagle. The Bald Eagle population cannot support the loss to its population that would occur if this proposition goes forward.  The Bald Eagle was taken off the Endangered List in 2007, after many years of concentrated effort.  Given that each Bald Eagle breeding pair has on average 2 chicks a year and only 1 of those eaglets makes it through its first year of life, this kind of take/kill is unacceptable for any kind of population stability.  There are approximately 143,000 Bald Eagles. The permits may allow the killing of 4200 bald eagle a year.  The math simply does not work in the eagles favor.

This problem is fixable - if we act now.
